price: Lẹ́yìn náà, A mú àdéhùn Wa ṣẹ fún wọn. A sì gba àwọn Òjíṣẹ́ àti àwọn tí A bá fẹ́ là. A sì pa àwọn olùtayọ ẹnu-ààlà run.
arabic: ثُمَّ صَدَقۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡوَعۡدَ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَمَن نَّشَآءُ وَأَهۡلَكۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma ṣadaqnāhumu al-waʿda fa-anjaynāhum waman nashāu wa-ahlaknā al-mus'rifīna
